faqs.question: How do I start planning my wedding on Vows & Veils?
faqs.answer: To get started, sign in using your Google account. After signing in, you'll be prompted to fill in basic wedding details on the provided form including your wedding date, couple names, and other essential information. Once completed, you'll have access to your personal dashboard.

faqs.question: What do I do once I have signed in?
faqs.answer: After signing in, begin planning your special day by following these steps in order: 1) Select a wedding venue, 2) Add your guests to create your guest list, 3) Create and customize your invitation, and 4) Choose vendor services (catering, photography, flowers, etc.). Following this order ensures a smooth planning process.

faqs.question: How do I choose a wedding venue?
faqs.answer: To select your wedding venue, go to your dashboard and click 'Venues' on the sidebar. You'll see various available venue options with photos, capacity, location, and amenities. Click on any venue to view more detailed information including pricing estimates and availability. When you find the perfect venue, click the 'Select' button to choose it for your wedding.

faqs.question: How do I add guests?
faqs.answer: To add guests, go to your dashboard and select 'Guests' on the sidebar. Click the 'Add Guest' button and enter the guest's details including their full name (required), email, phone number, and dietary restrictions (optional). After adding guests, you'll receive a unique RSVP code that you must share with your guests so they can confirm their attendance. You can add as many guests as you need.

faqs.question: How does the RSVP code work?
faqs.answer: When you add guests to your guest list, the system generates a unique RSVP code for your wedding. This code acts as a security measure to ensure only invited guests can RSVP to your wedding. Share this code with all your guests via your invitation. When guests want to RSVP, they'll enter this code on the RSVP page to confirm their attendance.

faqs.question: What if a guest is not able to RSVP online?
faqs.answer: No problem! If a guest cannot RSVP online (due to technical issues or lack of internet access), you can manually RSVP for them. When adding or editing a guest in your guest list, simply set their status to 'Accepted' manually. They will then appear on your accepted guests list without needing to RSVP online themselves.

faqs.question: Do I have to fill in all the details when adding a new guest?
faqs.answer: No, you don't need to fill in every field! The only required information to add a guest is their full name. All other details like email, phone number, dietary restrictions, and plus-one status are optional. You can always edit and add more details later if needed.

faqs.question: How do I create an invitation?
faqs.answer: To create your wedding invitation, go to your dashboard and select 'Invitations' on the sidebar. Browse through various beautiful invitation templates and choose one that matches your wedding theme. Customize it by adding your personal message, wedding details, and uploading a photo of you and your partner. Once satisfied, you can preview and finalize your invitation.

faqs.question: How do I send the invitations to my guests?
faqs.answer: After completing your invitation design, click the download button to save it to your device. You can then send it to your guests via email, messaging apps, or print it for physical distribution. Important: Make sure to include your unique RSVP code along with the invitation, as guests will need it to confirm their attendance on the website. The invitation also includes a direct link to the RSVP page.

faqs.question: How do I choose vendor services?
faqs.answer: To book vendor services, go to your dashboard and select 'Vendors' on the sidebar. You'll see various vendor categories including catering, photography, videography, flowers, music/DJ, and more. Each service displays the price range, maximum guest capacity, service description, and vendor ratings. Browse through options, and when you find a service you like, click 'Order' to send an inquiry to the vendor company.

faqs.question: How will I know the price of venues and vendor services?
faqs.answer: The website displays estimated price ranges for venues and vendor services. However, final pricing is arranged directly between you and the service provider. After you select a venue or order a vendor service, the company will contact you privately via email or phone to discuss detailed pricing, payment options, packages, and any customization you may need. All financial transactions happen off-site.

faqs.question: How do I RSVP to a wedding?
faqs.answer: To RSVP to a wedding as a guest, go to the RSVP section of the website. Enter the invitation code that the couple provided to you. Fill in the required details including your full name, confirm your attendance (attending or declining), dietary restrictions, and any additional notes for the couple. Submit the form to complete your RSVP.

faqs.question: What if I am unable to RSVP on the website?
faqs.answer: If you're experiencing difficulties RSVPing on the website due to technical issues or don't have internet access, simply contact the couple directly via phone, email, or text message. Let them know your attendance status and any important details. They can manually add your RSVP to their guest list on your behalf.

faqs.question: How do I add my company to the website?
faqs.answer: To register your company on Vows & Veils, sign in using Google and select the company type you want to register: either 'Venue Company' or 'Vendor Company'. Fill in the basic company registration form including company name, description, contact information, and business details. Once submitted, you can start adding your venues or vendor services. Note: If you offer both venues and vendor services, you'll need to create separate profiles for each.

faqs.question: How do I add a venue to my company profile?
faqs.answer: First, ensure you have a Venue Company profile created. Go to your company dashboard and click the 'Add Venue' button. Fill in the venue details including name, location, capacity, amenities, pricing, photos, and description. Submit the venue for admin review. Once the admin approves your venue (usually within 24-48 hours), it will appear on the main venues page for couples to browse and select.

faqs.question: Can I delete a venue that I no longer have available?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely! Go to your Venue Company dashboard where you'll see all your listed venues. Find the venue you want to remove and click the 'Delete Venue' button. Confirm the deletion when prompted. The venue will be immediately removed from the website and will no longer be visible to couples.

faqs.question: Can I edit the details of a venue that has already been added?
faqs.answer: Yes! Go to your Venue Company dashboard and locate the venue you want to modify. Click the 'Edit Venue' button next to that venue. You can update any information including photos, pricing, capacity, amenities, description, and availability. Save your changes and they will be updated immediately on the website.

faqs.question: How do I add a vendor service?
faqs.answer: First, ensure you have a Vendor Company profile created. Go to your company dashboard and click the 'Add Service' button. Select the service category (catering, photography, videography, flowers, music/DJ, etc.) and fill in the service details including name, description, pricing, maximum guest capacity, packages offered, and photos. Submit the service for admin review. Once approved by the admin (typically within 24-48 hours), your service will be available for couples to browse and order.

faqs.question: Can I delete a vendor service that I no longer offer?
faqs.answer: Yes! Go to your Vendor Company dashboard where you'll see all your listed services. Find the service you want to remove and click the 'Delete Service' button. Confirm the deletion when prompted. The service will be immediately removed from the website and couples will no longer be able to order it.

faqs.question: Can I have different types of vendor services in one company?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Your Vendor Company can offer multiple service categories. For example, you can offer both catering and photography services under one company profile. When adding a new service, simply select the appropriate category for each service. This allows you to showcase all your services in one place while keeping them organized by type.

faqs.question: What if I have one company that offers both venues and vendor services?
faqs.answer: No problem! However, due to the system's structure, you'll need to create two separate company profiles: one for Venue Company and another for Vendor Company. Both can have the same company name and contact information. This separation helps couples browse venues and vendor services in their respective sections more easily.

faqs.question: How do I know if the admin has approved my venue or vendor service?
faqs.answer: Check the status indicator in your company dashboard next to each venue or vendor service you've submitted. If the status shows 'Active', it means the admin has approved it and it's now live on the website for couples to see. If it shows 'Pending', the admin hasn't reviewed it yet. Approval typically takes 24-48 hours. You may also receive an email notification once approved.

faqs.question: What if the admin does not approve my venue or vendor service?
faqs.answer: If your venue or vendor service is not approved, it won't be visible to couples on the website. The admin may reject submissions that don't meet quality standards, have incomplete information, or violate guidelines. You'll receive feedback explaining the reason. You can then make the necessary corrections and resubmit for review. Feel free to improve your listing with better photos, more detailed descriptions, or updated information before reapplying.

faqs.question: How do I accept or decline a couple's request for my venue or vendor service?
faqs.answer: Go to your company dashboard (Venue or Vendor) where you'll see a section showing pending orders or inquiries from couples. Each request displays the couple's information, wedding date, guest count, and special requirements. You'll see a status dropdown menu where you can select either 'Accept' to confirm the booking or 'Decline' if you're unavailable. Once you update the status, the couple will be notified of your decision.

faqs.question: How do payments work?
faqs.answer: Vows & Veils acts as a connection platform between couples and service providers. All payment arrangements, including deposits, payment schedules, accepted payment methods, and final pricing, are discussed and handled directly between you (the couple or company) and the service provider privately. No financial transactions occur through the website. Contact details are shared once a booking is made so you can arrange payment terms that work for both parties.

faqs.question: How do I add a Vendor or Venue Company?
faqs.answer: To add your company, go to the home page and click on the 'Add Services' button. From there, choose whether you want to add a Vendor Company or a Venue Company. After selecting, simply fill in all the required details such as your company name, description, and contact information, then submit the form to complete your registration.
